Name: CyberHeroes Arena
About the game: CyberHeroes Arena is an autobattle roguelite. Choose your cyber hero, create your build and destroy all cyber monsters to survive. Choose from 7 CyberHeroes, each hero has unique attributes, making each run different and unique. (Destroyer, Sprinter, Defender, The Regenerate and more) Face various cyber monsters and survive. Automatic battle. Many powers and items to power your CyberHero. More than 40 skills. (Sky Cannon, Infected Rain, Tranquilizer Bomb and much more) Special Effects Skills. (Stun, Burn, Slow, Poison) 100 items to create your build. Survive waves from 15 to 90 seconds. short runs lasting up to 30 minutes.
